com.jme3.network.rmi

Class RmiSerializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jme3.network.serializing.Serializer
      • com.jme3.network.rmi.RmiSerializer

  • public class RmiSerializer
extends Serializer
    RmiSerializer is responsible for serializing RMI messages like define object, call, and return.
